item.title: 14 Best Office Chairs of 2024— I've Tested 55+ to Pick Them
item.description: Sitting at a desk for hours? Upgrade your WFH setup and work in style with these comfy WIRED-tested seats.

item.title: 2025 Will Be Smart Glasses All the Way Down
item.description: The past year has been filled with announcements about new smart glasses from companies big and small. Don’t expect the deluge to let up anytime soon.

item.title: Use the ‘Anti-AI’ Camera Apps Zerocam and Hallide to Keep Your Photos Looking More Natural
item.description: It’s still possible to just take normal-looking photos. Use these apps for Android and iOS to give your phone’s camera a more natural eye.

item.title: Generative AI Still Needs to Prove Its Usefulness
item.description: The hype is fading, and people are asking what generative artificial intelligence is really good for. So far, no one has a decent answer.

item.title: eBay Coupon Codes and Deals: Up to 60% Off Select Items
item.description: Save up to 60% on a selection of items at eBay, including electronics, home products, card games, and more.
